title: 79/431/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 April 1979 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Directive 72/159/EEC and Titles III and VI of Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 April 1979  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Directive 72/159/EEC and Titles III and IV of Directive 75/268/EEC  (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)  (79/431/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions for the implementation of Directive 72/159/EEC notified by the Government of Belgium on 16 July 1974 continue, in the light of the provisions specified in the preamble, to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 April 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1.
